title: Component Definition
description: Defines the structure for a single component type definition file, specifying its ID, an optional schema declaration for itself, the schema for its data payload, and metadata for resolving definition IDs to instance IDs.

name.description: Optional. Human-readable label for the component when exposed in tooling or debug output.

dataSchema.description: A JSON Schema object defining the structure of the data this component holds. Can be an empty object schema for 'tag' components.

validationRules.description: Optional validation rules for generating validators

generateValidator.description: Whether to generate a validator from this schema

invalidEnum.description: Template for enum validation failures. Available variables: {{value}}, {{validValues}}

missingRequired.description: Template for required field failures. Available variables: {{field}}

invalidType.description: Template for type validation failures. Available variables: {{field}}, {{expected}}, {{actual}}

minimum.description: Template for minimum value validation failures. Available variables: {{field}}, {{limit}}, {{value}}

maximum.description: Template for maximum value validation failures. Available variables: {{field}}, {{limit}}, {{value}}

exclusiveMinimum.description: Template for exclusive minimum validation failures. Available variables: {{field}}, {{limit}}, {{value}}

exclusiveMaximum.description: Template for exclusive maximum validation failures. Available variables: {{field}}, {{limit}}, {{value}}

enableSimilarity.description: Enable similarity-based suggestions for enum values

maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of suggestions to provide
